antgame.services

Interface NumberGenerator


  • public interface NumberGenerator
    A NumberGenerator class is one which implements a function to generate the next number in a series given a dependent number. A NumberGenerator must be passed into a Random.NumberSeries class at construction
    Author:
    Alex

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long nextLong(long n)
      Return the next (long) integer in a series from some dependent number.

    • Method Detail

      • nextLong

        long nextLong(long n)
        Return the next (long) integer in a series from some dependent number. For a simple series, this may simply be the previous number in the series.
        Parameters:
        n - The dependent number
        Returns:
        long The next number in the series
